text: Thomas Edward Nissalke (July 7, 1932 – August 22, 2019) was an American professional basketball coach. He worked for the National Basketball Association and American Basketball Association. He coached several teams in both leagues, and had an overall coaching record of 371–508. He worked for the Houston Rockets, San Antonio Spurs and the Utah Jazz. Nissalke was born in Madison, Wisconsin. Nissalke died on August 22, 2019 at his home Salt Lake City, Utah at the age of 87.Former NBA coach Nissalke dies at 87 ==References== ==Other websites== * BasketballReference.com: Tom Nissalke Category:1932 births Category:2019 deaths Category:National Basketball Association coaches Category:Sportspeople from Madison, Wisconsin
title: Tom Nissalke
